faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Inopay.

q1.question: How does automatic deployment work?
q1.answer: You provide your VPS IP and SSH credentials. Inopay installs Docker, configures PostgreSQL, provisions SSL, and deploys your app. Everything is automatic, no commands to type.

q2.question: Are my secrets safe? (Zero-Knowledge)
q2.answer: Your SSH credentials and API keys are used only during deployment and then deleted. We store no secrets after installation.

q3.question: How long does deployment take?
q3.answer: About 10 minutes: analysis, AI cleaning, VPS configuration, and going live. Your app is in production with SSL and database in under fifteen minutes.

q4.question: Which AI platforms are compatible?
q4.answer: Lovable, Bolt, v0, Cursor, Replit, and all platforms generating modern React/Vue/JavaScript code. AI cleaning adapts the code to your infrastructure.
